name: SortableGridList
description: An sortable grid list (based on GridList component)
note: This component supports square items only

props.name: data
props.note: Do not update 'data' in 'onOrderChange' (i.e. for each order change); only update it when you change the items (i.g. adding and removing an item).
props.description: Data of items with an id prop as unique identifier

props.name: extraData
props.description: Pass any extra data that should trigger a re-render

props.name: flexMigration
props.description: A temporary migration flag for enabling flex on the list's container (like it should be by default)
